A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What the heck did I just watch? Definitely wasn't a Star Wars movies...more like a space movie with sprinkles of cheesy comedy\, useless social justice characters and a whole mess of other irrelevant takes compared to the previous movie by JJ Abrams. Would not recommend. Hopefully episode 9 can spin this trilogy in the right direction. Meaning the complete opposite of this movie.
